item.title: Messer Agnolotto
item.description: This recipe was shared with me by my cousin Filippo Novelli. I have translated it from Italian and posted it here for my reference. Egg Pasta Ingredients Amount Ingredient 300 g flour 3 eggs Directions Roll out dough and cut in the shape of a ravioli Stuff with ricotta, grated peccorino, and black pepper Rest for one (1) hour at room temperature Cook for four (4) minutes in boiling salted water Separately prepare the sauce with butter, sage, guanciale, and pepper.
